timeline.bodyText:
as far as I remember KN still doesn't support multiple threaded coroutines. Means you can't offload network execution to background thread using coroutines. Coroutines work only on main thread.
But what we can do is similar to Ktor and how we did at Shopify.

Wrap  network execution into suspendCancellableCoroutine
Before network execution create strong stable reference for passed continuation and pointer (via val continuationRef = StableRef.create(continuation).asCPointer())
Execute network and parse response in the background via regular NSURLSession
Switch back to main thread, and restore reference to continuation (asStableRef<CancellableContinuation<>>)
resume continuation.

If you want I can extract network executor that we have and add to this PR.
